raw_body: “Tony”/ Ex-Navy). At rest with Jesus. Loving son of Gerald (deceased) and Doreen (Australia), beloved husband of Jennifer (Rosy), loving father of Deborine (England) and Rehan (Australia), father-in-law of Kishan and Qontas, loving grandfather of Lindsay, Duane and Raphael, brother of Anneline, Patrick (Patty), late Douglas (Billy), Rita, Charmanine (Debbie) and Estella. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour. Funeral service will take place
